physicalDescription.extent: The Reports are bound in chronological order from the front to the rear of the volume.

Foliation: the foliation system in use commences at 1 on the front cover and continues through to 207 on the back cover. The sequence is written in pencil, enclosed in a circle, and appears in the top right hand corner of the recto page of each folio.
